functional_units.name: Random Slice Benchmarking Harness
functional_units.description: Deterministic micro-benchmarks that exercise random slice reads across MappedReader and ChunkedFileReader, wired into a shared performance test target.

functional_units.name: LargeFileBenchmarkTests Extension
functional_units.description: Adds seeded random slice scenarios (small, medium, large) using existing fixture builder and respects PerformanceBenchmarkConfiguration iteration controls.

functional_units.name: Deterministic SplitMix64 Generator
functional_units.description: Provides reproducible random slice scenario descriptions for both readers to run identical workloads.

functional_units.name: Throughput Summary Printer
functional_units.description: Prints per-scenario throughput summaries from the test harness for baseline numbers.
